compare

public static boolean compare(java.util.Calendar cal1, java.lang.String comparator, java.util.Calendar cal2)
Compares 2 cal1 and cal2 based on the comparator passed in. comparator can be one of the following strings: "<=", "==", ">=", "<", ">"; If comparator is any other string, false is returned. If either cal1 OR cal2 is null, false is returned.
